snippet: Vitali Klitschko retained his World Boxing Council world heavyweight title when the referee stopped the contest against Manuel Charr after the German sustained a deep cut above his right eye.
abstract: Vitali Klitschko retains his World Boxing Council world heavyweight title when the referee stops the contest against Manuel Charr after the German sustained a deep cut above his right eye.
lead_paragraph: Vitali Klitschko retained his World Boxing Council world heavyweight title when the referee stopped the contest against Manuel Charr after the German sustained a deep cut above his right eye.

headline.seo: Vitali Klitschko Retains World Heavyweight Crown
